entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 29.
